title: Introducing: Rivka
body: [**Rivka**](http://www.facebook.com/wearerivka) is a Pittsburgh based electronic band headed up by Reggie Wilkins and Rivka Rose. The rules of the game at first glace seem simple; washed out electronics, dream like vocals and blissful synths all form something that on paper, we’ve all heard before. But they have so much more; dramatic shifts in tone, dark and souring synth work and ultimately great song writing take this little group into a privileged position. Their debut release has been out for a little over a month now. Download it below.
